attributes.action: Bring in compulsory community based work for the long term benefit claiments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Compulsory community work for all the long term unemployed.To be run through the local authorities. This to reduce or stop the annual rate rises due to lack of manpower or funding. This would also negate the ability for these persons to cheat the system and relieve the cost to taxpayers in funding the ever increasing financial burden of pressure on the exchequer which affects everyone.The something for nothing culture which all successive goverments have condoned has to stop.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
